command.program:
mkdir bowtie
    bowtie2-build --threads 1 GCA_002596845.1_ASM259684v1_genomic.fna.gz "bt2_index_base"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:BOWTIE2_PHIX_REMOVAL_BUILD":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir db_tmp
    tar -xf "minigut_kraken.tgz" -C db_tmp
    mkdir database
    mv `find db_tmp/ -name "*.k2d"` database/

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:KRAKEN2_DB_PREPARATION":
        tar: $(tar --version 2>&1 | sed -n 1p | sed 's/tar (GNU tar) //')
    END_VERSIONS

tar -xf "minigut_cf.tar.gz"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:CENTRIFUGE_DB_PREPARATION":
        tar: $(tar --version 2>&1 | sed -n 1p | sed 's/tar (GNU tar) //')
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir buscodb
    tar -xf bacteria_odb10.2020-03-06.tar.gz -C buscodb

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:BUSCO_QC:BUSCO_DB_PREPARATION":
        tar: $(tar --version 2>&1 | sed -n 1p | sed 's/tar (GNU tar) //')
    END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  test_minigut_sample2_1.fastq.gz ] && ln -s test_minigut_sample2_R1.fastq.gz test_minigut_sample2_1.fastq.gz
        [ ! -f  test_minigut_sample2_2.fastq.gz ] && ln -s test_minigut_sample2_R2.fastq.gz test_minigut_sample2_2.fastq.gz
        fastp \
            --in1 test_minigut_sample2_1.fastq.gz \
            --in2 test_minigut_sample2_2.fastq.gz \
            --out1 test_minigut_sample2_1.trim.fastq.gz \
            --out2 test_minigut_sample2_2.trim.fastq.gz \
            --json test_minigut_sample2.fastp.json \
            --html test_minigut_sample2.fastp.html \
             \
             \
            --thread 1 \
            --detect_adapter_for_pe \
            -q 15 --cut_front --cut_tail --cut_mean_quality 15 --length_required 15 \
            2> test_minigut_sample2.fastp.log

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:FASTP":
            fastp: $(fastp --version 2>&1 | sed -e "s/fastp //g")
        END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  test_minigut_sample2_1.fastq.gz ] && ln -s test_minigut_sample2_R1.fastq.gz test_minigut_sample2_1.fastq.gz
        [ ! -f  test_minigut_sample2_2.fastq.gz ] && ln -s test_minigut_sample2_R2.fastq.gz test_minigut_sample2_2.fastq.gz
        fastqc --quiet --threads 1 test_minigut_sample2_1.fastq.gz test_minigut_sample2_2.fastq.gz

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:FASTQC_RAW":
            fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
        END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  test_minigut_1.fastq.gz ] && ln -s test_minigut_R1.fastq.gz test_minigut_1.fastq.gz
        [ ! -f  test_minigut_2.fastq.gz ] && ln -s test_minigut_R2.fastq.gz test_minigut_2.fastq.gz
        fastqc --quiet --threads 1 test_minigut_1.fastq.gz test_minigut_2.fastq.gz

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:FASTQC_RAW":
            fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
        END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  test_minigut_1.fastq.gz ] && ln -s test_minigut_R1.fastq.gz test_minigut_1.fastq.gz
        [ ! -f  test_minigut_2.fastq.gz ] && ln -s test_minigut_R2.fastq.gz test_minigut_2.fastq.gz
        fastp \
            --in1 test_minigut_1.fastq.gz \
            --in2 test_minigut_2.fastq.gz \
            --out1 test_minigut_1.trim.fastq.gz \
            --out2 test_minigut_2.trim.fastq.gz \
            --json test_minigut.fastp.json \
            --html test_minigut.fastp.html \
             \
             \
            --thread 1 \
            --detect_adapter_for_pe \
            -q 15 --cut_front --cut_tail --cut_mean_quality 15 --length_required 15 \
            2> test_minigut.fastp.log

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:FASTP":
            fastp: $(fastp --version 2>&1 | sed -e "s/fastp //g")
        END_VERSIONS

bowtie2 -p 1                 -x bt2_index_base                 -1 "test_minigut_sample2_1.trim.fastq.gz" -2 "test_minigut_sample2_2.trim.fastq.gz"                                  --un-conc-gz test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_%.fastq.gz                 --al-conc-gz test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.mapped_%.fastq.gz                 1> /dev/null                 2> test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.bowtie2.log
        if [ N = "Y" ] ; then
            gunzip -c test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.mapped_1.fastq.gz | awk '{if(NR%4==1) print substr($0, 2)}' | LC_ALL=C sort > test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.mapped_1.read_ids.txt
            gunzip -c test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.mapped_2.fastq.gz | awk '{if(NR%4==1) print substr($0, 2)}' | LC_ALL=C sort > test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.mapped_2.read_ids.txt
        fi
        rm -f test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.mapped_*.fastq.gz

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:BOWTIE2_PHIX_REMOVAL_ALIGN":
            bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
        END_VERSIONS

bowtie2 -p 1                 -x bt2_index_base                 -1 "test_minigut_1.trim.fastq.gz" -2 "test_minigut_2.trim.fastq.gz"                                  --un-conc-gz test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_%.fastq.gz                 --al-conc-gz test_minigut.phix_removed.mapped_%.fastq.gz                 1> /dev/null                 2> test_minigut.phix_removed.bowtie2.log
        if [ N = "Y" ] ; then
            gunzip -c test_minigut.phix_removed.mapped_1.fastq.gz | awk '{if(NR%4==1) print substr($0, 2)}' | LC_ALL=C sort > test_minigut.phix_removed.mapped_1.read_ids.txt
            gunzip -c test_minigut.phix_removed.mapped_2.fastq.gz | awk '{if(NR%4==1) print substr($0, 2)}' | LC_ALL=C sort > test_minigut.phix_removed.mapped_2.read_ids.txt
        fi
        rm -f test_minigut.phix_removed.mapped_*.fastq.gz

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:BOWTIE2_PHIX_REMOVAL_ALIGN":
            bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
        END_VERSIONS

kraken2         --report-zero-counts         --threads 1         --db database         --report kraken2_report.txt         --paired "test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz" "test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz"         > kraken2.kraken
    cat kraken2.kraken | cut -f 2,3 > results.krona

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:KRAKEN2":
        kraken2: $(echo $(kraken2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Kraken version //' | sed 's/ Copyright.*//')
    END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  test_minigut_sample2.trimmed_1.fastq.gz ] && ln -s test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz test_minigut_sample2.trimmed_1.fastq.gz
        [ ! -f  test_minigut_sample2.trimmed_2.fastq.gz ] && ln -s test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz test_minigut_sample2.trimmed_2.fastq.gz
        fastqc --quiet --threads 1 test_minigut_sample2.trimmed_1.fastq.gz test_minigut_sample2.trimmed_2.fastq.gz

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:FASTQC_TRIMMED":
            fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
        END_VERSIONS

centrifuge -x "minigut_cf"         -p 1         --report-file report.txt         -S results.txt         -1 "test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz" -2 "test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz"
    centrifuge-kreport -x "minigut_cf" results.txt > kreport.txt
    cat results.txt | cut -f 1,3 > results.krona

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:CENTRIFUGE":
        centrifuge: $(centrifuge --version | sed -n 1p | sed 's/^.*centrifuge-class version //')
    END_VERSIONS

metaspades.py                          --threads "1"             --memory 6             --pe1-1 test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz             --pe1-2 test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz             -o spades
        mv spades/assembly_graph_with_scaffolds.gfa SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2_graph.gfa
        mv spades/scaffolds.fasta SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2_scaffolds.fasta
        mv spades/contigs.fasta SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2_contigs.fasta
        mv spades/spades.log SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2.log
        gzip "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2_contigs.fasta"
        gzip "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2_graph.gfa"
        gzip -c "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2_scaffolds.fasta" > "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2_scaffolds.fasta.gz"

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:SPADES":
            python: $(python --version 2>&1 | sed 's/Python //g')
            metaspades: $(metaspades.py --version | sed "s/SPAdes genome assembler v//; s/ \[.*//")
        END_VERSIONS

megahit  -t "1" -m 6442450944 -1 "test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz" -2 "test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz" -o MEGAHIT --out-prefix "MEGAHIT-test_minigut_sample2"
        gzip -c "MEGAHIT/MEGAHIT-test_minigut_sample2.contigs.fa" > "MEGAHIT/MEGAHIT-test_minigut_sample2.contigs.fa.gz"

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:MEGAHIT":
            megahit: $(echo $(megahit -v 2>&1) | sed 's/MEGAHIT v//')
        END_VERSIONS

centrifuge -x "minigut_cf"         -p 1         --report-file report.txt         -S results.txt         -1 "test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz" -2 "test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz"
    centrifuge-kreport -x "minigut_cf" results.txt > kreport.txt
    cat results.txt | cut -f 1,3 > results.krona

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:CENTRIFUGE":
        centrifuge: $(centrifuge --version | sed -n 1p | sed 's/^.*centrifuge-class version //')
    END_VERSIONS

metaspades.py                          --threads "1"             --memory 6             --pe1-1 test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz             --pe1-2 test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz             -o spades
        mv spades/assembly_graph_with_scaffolds.gfa SPAdes-test_minigut_graph.gfa
        mv spades/scaffolds.fasta SPAdes-test_minigut_scaffolds.fasta
        mv spades/contigs.fasta SPAdes-test_minigut_contigs.fasta
        mv spades/spades.log SPAdes-test_minigut.log
        gzip "SPAdes-test_minigut_contigs.fasta"
        gzip "SPAdes-test_minigut_graph.gfa"
        gzip -c "SPAdes-test_minigut_scaffolds.fasta" > "SPAdes-test_minigut_scaffolds.fasta.gz"

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:SPADES":
            python: $(python --version 2>&1 | sed 's/Python //g')
            metaspades: $(metaspades.py --version | sed "s/SPAdes genome assembler v//; s/ \[.*//")
        END_VERSIONS

kraken2         --report-zero-counts         --threads 1         --db database         --report kraken2_report.txt         --paired "test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz" "test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz"         > kraken2.kraken
    cat kraken2.kraken | cut -f 2,3 > results.krona

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:KRAKEN2":
        kraken2: $(echo $(kraken2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Kraken version //' | sed 's/ Copyright.*//')
    END_VERSIONS

[ ! -f  test_minigut.trimmed_1.fastq.gz ] && ln -s test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz test_minigut.trimmed_1.fastq.gz
        [ ! -f  test_minigut.trimmed_2.fastq.gz ] && ln -s test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz test_minigut.trimmed_2.fastq.gz
        fastqc --quiet --threads 1 test_minigut.trimmed_1.fastq.gz test_minigut.trimmed_2.fastq.gz

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:FASTQC_TRIMMED":
            fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
        END_VERSIONS

megahit  -t "1" -m 6442450944 -1 "test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz" -2 "test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz" -o MEGAHIT --out-prefix "MEGAHIT-test_minigut"
        gzip -c "MEGAHIT/MEGAHIT-test_minigut.contigs.fa" > "MEGAHIT/MEGAHIT-test_minigut.contigs.fa.gz"

        cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
        "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:MEGAHIT":
            megahit: $(echo $(megahit -v 2>&1) | sed 's/MEGAHIT v//')
        END_VERSIONS

mkdir bowtie
    bowtie2-build --threads 1 SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2_scaffolds.fasta "bt2_index_base"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:BINNING_PREPARATION:BOWTIE2_ASSEMBLY_BUILD":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

pigz -cdf SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2_scaffolds.fasta | prodigal \
        -p meta \
        -f gff \
        -d "test_minigut_sample2.fna" \
        -o "test_minigut_sample2.gff" \
        -a "test_minigut_sample2.faa" \
        -s "test_minigut_sample2_all.txt"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:PRODIGAL":
        prodigal: $(prodigal -v 2>&1 | sed -n 's/Prodigal V\(.*\):.*/\1/p')
        pigz: $(pigz -V 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g')
    END_VERSIONS

metaquast.py --threads "1" --rna-finding --max-ref-number 0 -l "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2" "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2_scaffolds.fasta" -o "QUAST"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:QUAST":
        python: $(python --version 2>&1 | sed 's/Python //g')
        metaquast: $(metaquast.py --version | sed "s/QUAST v//; s/ (MetaQUAST mode)//")
    END_VERSIONS

metaquast.py --threads "1" --rna-finding --max-ref-number 0 -l "MEGAHIT-test_minigut_sample2" "MEGAHIT-test_minigut_sample2.contigs.fa" -o "QUAST"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:QUAST":
        python: $(python --version 2>&1 | sed 's/Python //g')
        metaquast: $(metaquast.py --version | sed "s/QUAST v//; s/ (MetaQUAST mode)//")
    END_VERSIONS

pigz -cdf MEGAHIT-test_minigut_sample2.contigs.fa | prodigal \
        -p meta \
        -f gff \
        -d "test_minigut_sample2.fna" \
        -o "test_minigut_sample2.gff" \
        -a "test_minigut_sample2.faa" \
        -s "test_minigut_sample2_all.txt"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:PRODIGAL":
        prodigal: $(prodigal -v 2>&1 | sed -n 's/Prodigal V\(.*\):.*/\1/p')
        pigz: $(pigz -V 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g')
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir bowtie
    bowtie2-build --threads 1 MEGAHIT-test_minigut_sample2.contigs.fa "bt2_index_base"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:BINNING_PREPARATION:BOWTIE2_ASSEMBLY_BUILD":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

metaquast.py --threads "1" --rna-finding --max-ref-number 0 -l "SPAdes-test_minigut" "SPAdes-test_minigut_scaffolds.fasta" -o "QUAST"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:QUAST":
        python: $(python --version 2>&1 | sed 's/Python //g')
        metaquast: $(metaquast.py --version | sed "s/QUAST v//; s/ (MetaQUAST mode)//")
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir bowtie
    bowtie2-build --threads 1 SPAdes-test_minigut_scaffolds.fasta "bt2_index_base"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:BINNING_PREPARATION:BOWTIE2_ASSEMBLY_BUILD":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

pigz -cdf SPAdes-test_minigut_scaffolds.fasta | prodigal \
        -p meta \
        -f gff \
        -d "test_minigut.fna" \
        -o "test_minigut.gff" \
        -a "test_minigut.faa" \
        -s "test_minigut_all.txt"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:PRODIGAL":
        prodigal: $(prodigal -v 2>&1 | sed -n 's/Prodigal V\(.*\):.*/\1/p')
        pigz: $(pigz -V 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g')
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir bowtie
    bowtie2-build --threads 1 MEGAHIT-test_minigut.contigs.fa "bt2_index_base"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:BINNING_PREPARATION:BOWTIE2_ASSEMBLY_BUILD":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

pigz -cdf MEGAHIT-test_minigut.contigs.fa | prodigal \
        -p meta \
        -f gff \
        -d "test_minigut.fna" \
        -o "test_minigut.gff" \
        -a "test_minigut.faa" \
        -s "test_minigut_all.txt"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:PRODIGAL":
        prodigal: $(prodigal -v 2>&1 | sed -n 's/Prodigal V\(.*\):.*/\1/p')
        pigz: $(pigz -V 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g')
    END_VERSIONS

metaquast.py --threads "1" --rna-finding --max-ref-number 0 -l "MEGAHIT-test_minigut" "MEGAHIT-test_minigut.contigs.fa" -o "QUAST"

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:QUAST":
        python: $(python --version 2>&1 | sed 's/Python //g')
        metaquast: $(metaquast.py --version | sed "s/QUAST v//; s/ (MetaQUAST mode)//")
    END_VERSIONS

INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2l" -o -name "*.rev.1.bt2" | sed 's/.rev.1.bt2l//' | sed 's/.rev.1.bt2//'`
    bowtie2 \
        -p "1" \
        -x $INDEX \
         \
        -1 "test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz" -2 "test_minigut.phix_removed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz" \
        2> "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2-test_minigut.bowtie2.log" |         samtools view -@ "1" -bS |         samtools sort -@ "1" -o "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2-test_minigut.bam"
    samtools index "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2-test_minigut.bam"

    if [ SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2-test_minigut = "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2-test_minigut_sample2" ] ; then
        mv "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2-test_minigut.bowtie2.log" "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2.bowtie2.log"
    fi

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:BINNING_PREPARATION:BOWTIE2_ASSEMBLY_ALIGN":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')
        pigz: $( pigz --version 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g' )
    END_VERSIONS

INDEX=`find -L ./ -name "*.rev.1.bt2l" -o -name "*.rev.1.bt2" | sed 's/.rev.1.bt2l//' | sed 's/.rev.1.bt2//'`
    bowtie2 \
        -p "1" \
        -x $INDEX \
         \
        -1 "test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_1.fastq.gz" -2 "test_minigut_sample2.phix_removed.unmapped_2.fastq.gz" \
        2> "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2-test_minigut_sample2.bowtie2.log" |         samtools view -@ "1" -bS |         samtools sort -@ "1" -o "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2-test_minigut_sample2.bam"
    samtools index "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2-test_minigut_sample2.bam"

    if [ SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2-test_minigut_sample2 = "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2-test_minigut_sample2" ] ; then
        mv "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2-test_minigut_sample2.bowtie2.log" "SPAdes-test_minigut_sample2.bowtie2.log"
    fi

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:BINNING_PREPARATION:BOWTIE2_ASSEMBLY_ALIGN":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
        samtools: $(echo $(samtools --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*samtools //; s/Using.*$//')

        # get name of used specific lineage dataset
        summaries=(BUSCO/short_summary.specific.*.BUSCO.txt)
        if [ ${#summaries[@]} -ne 1 ]; then
            echo "ERROR: none or multiple 'BUSCO/short_summary.specific.*.BUSCO.txt' files found. Expected one."
            exit 1
        fi
        [[ $summaries =~ BUSCO/short_summary.specific.(.*).BUSCO.txt ]];
        db_name_spec="${BASH_REMATCH[1]}"
        most_spec_db=${db_name_spec}
        echo "Used specific lineage dataset: ${db_name_spec}"

        if [ Y = "Y" ]; then
            cp BUSCO/short_summary.specific.${db_name_spec}.BUSCO.txt short_summary.specific_lineage.${db_name_spec}.MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa.txt

            # if lineage dataset is provided, BUSCO analysis does not fail in case no genes can be found as when using the auto selection setting
            # report bin as failed to allow consistent warnings within the pipeline for both settings
            if egrep -q $'WARNING:	BUSCO did not find any match.' MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.log ; then
                echo "WARNING: BUSCO could not find any genes for the provided lineage dataset! See also MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.log."
                echo -e "MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa	No genes" > "MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.failed_bin.txt"
            fi
        else
            # auto lineage selection
            if { egrep -q $'INFO:	\S+ selected' MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.log                 && egrep -q $'INFO:	Lineage \S+ is selected, supported by ' MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.log ; } ||                 { egrep -q $'INFO:	\S+ selected' MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.log                 && egrep -q $'INFO:	The results from the Prodigal gene predictor indicate that your data belongs to the mollicutes clade. Testing subclades...' MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.log                 && egrep -q $'INFO:	Using local lineages directory ' MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.log ; }; then
                # the second statement is necessary, because certain mollicute clades use a different genetic code, are not part of the BUSCO placement tree, are tested separately
                # and cause different log messages
                echo "Domain and specific lineage could be selected by BUSCO."
                cp BUSCO/short_summary.specific.${db_name_spec}.BUSCO.txt short_summary.specific_lineage.${db_name_spec}.MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa.txt

                db_name_gen=""
                summaries_gen=(BUSCO/short_summary.generic.*.BUSCO.txt)
                if [ ${#summaries_gen[@]} -lt 1 ]; then
                    echo "No 'BUSCO/short_summary.generic.*.BUSCO.txt' file found. Assuming selected domain and specific lineages are the same."
                    cp BUSCO/short_summary.specific.${db_name_spec}.BUSCO.txt short_summary.domain.${db_name_spec}.MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa.txt
                    db_name_gen=${db_name_spec}
                else
                    [[ $summaries_gen =~ BUSCO/short_summary.generic.(.*).BUSCO.txt ]];
                    db_name_gen="${BASH_REMATCH[1]}"
                    echo "Used generic lineage dataset: ${db_name_gen}"
                    cp BUSCO/short_summary.generic.${db_name_gen}.BUSCO.txt short_summary.domain.${db_name_gen}.MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa.txt
                fi

                for f in BUSCO/run_${db_name_gen}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*faa; do
                    cat BUSCO/run_${db_name_gen}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*faa | gzip >MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_buscos.${db_name_gen}.faa.gz
                    break
                done
                for f in BUSCO/run_${db_name_gen}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*fna; do
                    cat BUSCO/run_${db_name_gen}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*fna | gzip >MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_buscos.${db_name_gen}.fna.gz
                    break
                done

            elif egrep -q $'INFO:	\S+ selected' MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.log && egrep -q $'INFO:	Not enough markers were placed on the tree \([0-9]*\). Root lineage \S+ is kept' MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.log ; then
                echo "Domain could be selected by BUSCO, but no more specific lineage."
                cp BUSCO/short_summary.specific.${db_name_spec}.BUSCO.txt short_summary.domain.${db_name_spec}.MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa.txt

            elif egrep -q $'INFO:	\S+ selected' MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.log && egrep -q $'INFO:	Running virus detection pipeline' MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.log ; then

                cp BUSCO/short_summary.specific.${db_name_spec}.BUSCO.txt short_summary.specific_lineage.${db_name_spec}.MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa.txt
            else
                echo "ERROR: Some not expected case occurred! See MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.log." >&2
                exit 1
            fi

            break

        echo -e "MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa	No genes" > "MEGAHIT-MaxBin2-test_minigut.002.fa_busco.failed_bin.txt"

            break

                    echo "Used generic lineage dataset: ${db_name_gen}"
                    cp BUSCO/short_summary.generic.${db_name_gen}.BUSCO.txt short_summary.domain.${db_name_gen}.SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa.txt
                fi

                for f in BUSCO/run_${db_name_gen}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*faa; do
                    cat BUSCO/run_${db_name_gen}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*faa | gzip >SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_buscos.${db_name_gen}.faa.gz
                    break
                done
                for f in BUSCO/run_${db_name_gen}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*fna; do
                    cat BUSCO/run_${db_name_gen}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*fna | gzip >SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_buscos.${db_name_gen}.fna.gz
                    break
                done

            elif egrep -q $'INFO:	\S+ selected' SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.log && egrep -q $'INFO:	Not enough markers were placed on the tree \([0-9]*\). Root lineage \S+ is kept' SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.log ; then
                echo "Domain could be selected by BUSCO, but no more specific lineage."
                cp BUSCO/short_summary.specific.${db_name_spec}.BUSCO.txt short_summary.domain.${db_name_spec}.SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa.txt

            elif egrep -q $'INFO:	\S+ selected' SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.log && egrep -q $'INFO:	Running virus detection pipeline' SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.log ; then
                # TODO double-check if selected dataset is not one of bacteria_*, archaea_*, eukaryota_*?
                echo "Domain could not be selected by BUSCO, but virus dataset was selected."
                cp BUSCO/short_summary.specific.${db_name_spec}.BUSCO.txt short_summary.specific_lineage.${db_name_spec}.SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa.txt
            else
                echo "ERROR: Some not expected case occurred! See SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.log." >&2
                exit 1
            fi
        fi

        for f in BUSCO/run_${db_name_spec}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*faa; do
            cat BUSCO/run_${db_name_spec}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*faa | gzip >SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_buscos.${db_name_spec}.faa.gz
            break
        done
        for f in BUSCO/run_${db_name_spec}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*fna; do
            cat BUSCO/run_${db_name_spec}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*fna | gzip >SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_buscos.${db_name_spec}.fna.gz
            break
        done

    elif egrep -q $'ERROR:	No genes were recognized by BUSCO' SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.err ; then
        echo "WARNING: BUSCO analysis failed due to no recognized genes! See also SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.err."
        echo -e "SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa	No genes" > "SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.failed_bin.txt"

    elif egrep -q $'INFO:	\S+ selected' SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.log && egrep -q $'ERROR:	Placements failed' SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.err ; then
        echo "WARNING: BUSCO analysis failed due to failed placements! See also SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.err. Still using results for selected generic lineage dataset."
        echo -e "SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa	Placements failed" > "SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.failed_bin.txt"

        message=$(egrep $'INFO:	\S+ selected' SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.log)
        [[ $message =~ INFO:[[:space:]]([_[:alnum:]]+)[[:space:]]selected ]];
        db_name_gen="${BASH_REMATCH[1]}"
        most_spec_db=${db_name_gen}
        echo "Used generic lineage dataset: ${db_name_gen}"
        cp BUSCO/auto_lineage/run_${db_name_gen}/short_summary.txt short_summary.domain.${db_name_gen}.SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa.txt

        for f in BUSCO/auto_lineage/run_${db_name_gen}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*faa; do
            cat BUSCO/auto_lineage/run_${db_name_gen}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*faa | gzip >SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_buscos.${db_name_gen}.faa.gz
            break
        done
        for f in BUSCO/auto_lineage/run_${db_name_gen}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*fna; do
            cat BUSCO/auto_lineage/run_${db_name_gen}/busco_sequences/single_copy_busco_sequences/*fna | gzip >SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_buscos.${db_name_gen}.fna.gz
            break
        done

    else
        echo "ERROR: BUSCO analysis failed for some unknown reason! See also SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_busco.err." >&2
        exit 1
    fi

    # additionally output genes predicted with Prodigal (GFF3)
    if [ -f BUSCO/logs/prodigal_out.log ]; then
        mv BUSCO/logs/prodigal_out.log "SPAdes-MetaBAT2-test_minigut_sample2.unbinned.2.fa_prodigal.gff"
    fi

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_MAG:MAG:BUSCO_QC:BUSCO":
        python: $(python --version 2>&1 | sed 's/Python //g')
        R: $(R --version 2>&1 | sed -n 1p | sed 's/R version //' | sed 's/ (.*//')
        busco: $(busco --version 2>&1 | sed 's/BUSCO //g')
    END_VERSIONS
